00025 typedef struct pse51_mutex {
00026     xnsynch_t synchbase;
00027     xnholder_t link;            /* Link in pse51_mutexq */
00028 
00029 #define link2mutex(laddr)                                               \
00030     ((pse51_mutex_t *)(((char *)laddr) - offsetof(pse51_mutex_t, link)))
00031 
00032     pthread_mutexattr_t attr;
00033     unsigned count;             /* lock count. */
00034     unsigned condvars;          /* count of condition variables using this
00035                                    mutex. */
00036 } pse51_mutex_t;

00042 /* Interruptible versions of pthread_mutex_*. Exposed for use by syscall.c. */
00043 int pse51_mutex_timedlock_break(struct __shadow_mutex *shadow, xnticks_t to);
00044 
00045 /* must be called with nklock locked, interrupts off. */
00046 static inline int mutex_trylock_internal(xnthread_t *cur,
00047                                          struct __shadow_mutex *shadow)
00048 {
00049     pse51_mutex_t *mutex = shadow->mutex;
00050 
00051     if (xnpod_unblockable_p())
00052         return EPERM;
00053 
00054     if (!pse51_obj_active(shadow, PSE51_MUTEX_MAGIC, struct __shadow_mutex))
00055         return EINVAL;
00056 
00057     if (mutex->count)
00058         return EBUSY;
00059 
00060     xnsynch_set_owner(&mutex->synchbase, cur);
00061     mutex->count = 1;
00062     return 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /* must be called with nklock locked, interrupts off. */
00066 static inline int mutex_timedlock_internal(xnthread_t *cur,
00067                                            struct __shadow_mutex *shadow,
00068                                            xnticks_t abs_to)
00069 
00070 {
00071     int err;
00072 
00073     err = mutex_trylock_internal(cur, shadow);
00074 
00075     if (err == EBUSY)
00076         {
00077         pse51_mutex_t *mutex = shadow->mutex;
00078 
00079         if (xnsynch_owner(&mutex->synchbase) != cur)
00080             do
00081                 {
00082                 xnticks_t to = abs_to;
00083                 
00084                 err = clock_adjust_timeout(&to, CLOCK_REALTIME);
00085                 
00086                 if (err)
00087                     return err;
00088                 
00089                 xnsynch_sleep_on(&mutex->synchbase, to);
00090                 
00091                 if (xnthread_test_flags(cur, XNBREAK))
00092                     return EINTR;
00093                 
00094                 if (xnthread_test_flags(cur, XNRMID))
00095                     return EINVAL;
00096                 
00097                 if (xnthread_test_flags(cur, XNTIMEO))
00098                     return ETIMEDOUT;
00099                 
00100                 err = mutex_trylock_internal(cur, shadow);
00101                 }
00102             while (err == EBUSY);
00103         }
00104 
00105     return err;
00106 }
